title: Renovated 3BR/1.5BTH in Brookline MA!
posting_body: Amazing opportunity to rent this stunning 3 bedroom, 1.5 bath unit in a 3 family house that has gone through renovations.
This unit has character and style with a spacious and flowing floor plan.
Kitchen has new stainless steel appliances and granite counter tops.
New private energy efficent washer/dryer in the unit!
0.2 miles to Lincoln School, 0.5 miles to Brookline Hills D-Line and 0.1 mile to #60 bus to Longwood Medical Area (BWH, HMS.
DFCI, BIDMC, HSPH, BU, Simmons or Emmanuel College) .7 to 10 minutes walk to Green Line D and E and Buses #39/65/66; and free shuttle bus to Longwood Medical Area.
Enjoy all that Brookline has to offer!
Rent Unit for Aug 1st or for Sept 1st!
